roleset.name: sums to
roleset.note: AMOUNT-V NOTES: Frames file for 'amount' based on sentences in financial subcorpus. No verbnet entry. Comparison with 'total'. (from amount.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: add it up
example.text: Big Board volume amounted to 154,240,000 shares, down from 176.1 million Tuesday.
example.arg: to 154,240,000 shares , down from 176.1 million Tuesday

roleset.name: is equivalent to
roleset.note: AMOUNT-V NOTES: Really the second roleset id="amount.02" is just a metaphorical extension of thefirst, but the distinction is pretty clear. (from amount.02-v)

example.name: separate but not equal
example.text: But in 1986, program traders received [what]-1 *trace*-1 amounted to an exemption from the uptick rule in certain situations, to make it easier to link the stock and futures markets.
example.arg: to an exemption from the uptick rule in certain situations
